website_summaries.verdict: This hand warmer and power bank works well and fits comfortably in the hand.
pros: Works well and is comfortable in the hand
Includes velvet pouch, charging cable, and lanyard
cons: USB port isn't super rugged and can break easily
Some say device doesn't get warm enough

customer_reviews.title: Great for the chilly season
customer_reviews.text: With winter approching, this is definitely going to be in my bag 24/7. It feels great whenever you need that extra warmth outside at night. I’ve used this the other evening during a baseball game and it was perfect as my phone was fully charged throughout the entire game and my hands were kept warm. The device is very easy to use, as after a couple of minutes the device is warm and toasty. It fits in the palm of your hand and your pockets. The temperature can be adjusted accordingly. The device was able to fully charge my phone from 1%, and even after that, there was still charge.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Dependable as a Hand Warmer
customer_reviews.text: This is a mysterious product. It lasts about 2 hours on a cold day on the golf course but lasts 4+ hours inside. Much more dependable than the Zippo hand warmers that use lighter fluid for fuel. I had to buy two for golf but that’s better than the inconsistency of my Zippo.
customer_reviews.author: Roamer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for people with cold hands!
customer_reviews.text: This hand warmer is amazing! I wish I had it sooner. My hands are constantly cold and I've tried a lot of products to help keep them warm but nothing has worked this well until now. There are three temperature settings which are very helpful - the highest setting is good for outdoors and the lower settings are good when I'm indoors. It can also be used as a power bank to charge my phone when needed. Overall I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than images make you believe!
customer_reviews.text: Dont get me wrong, its warm...but the pictures are very misleading. The real product is much smaller and only barely covers my entire palm. I will be returning this as the main reason I bought it was because I though it was much larger. True dimensions are only slightly larger than a credit card
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like about it is that I have relatively cold hands ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about it is that I have relatively cold hands and once you use it as a hand warmer, it transfers all the heat to your hands and then the device is room temperature. It does get hot, but it loses it rather quickly. I found myself putting it down afterwards to warm back up till I could use it on my hands again -- constantly repeating this.
